virtual stSize GetPageSize ()

Detailed Description

This class defines the abstract class stPageServer. A page server is a low-level block device interface that is used by stClientPageManager.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.usp.br)

Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)
